definitions.definition: Any of various primitive light-sensitive organs or regions in many diverse organisms.
An eye -like marking on the tail of a peacock or the wing of a butterfly .
A coloured spot in a motile gamete or spore , which is sensitive to light.
Any of a group of fungal infections of grasses that are characterized by oval spots; strawbreaker .

main_definition: ( biology , countable ) Any of various primitive light-sensitive organs or regions in many diverse organisms.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An eye -like marking on the tail of a peacock or the wing of a butterfly .
( botany , countable ) A coloured spot in a motile gamete or spore , which is sensitive to light.
( botany ) Any of a group of fungal infections of grasses that are characterized by oval spots; strawbreaker .
